example.name: layer-x3staff
example.description: How can/should this example be encoded in terms of staff layers? Example is from Beethoven piano sonata no. 8 in C minor, Op. 13, mvmt. 2: Adagio cantabile. The right hand moves to the bottom staff in the middle of the second measure.

file.name: x3staff.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: x3staff.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
